page.description: Set a blob to a bigger blob.

argument.name: position
argument.description: The byte position to write the data.

argument.name: blob
argument.description: The name of a blob variable.

page.discussion: The .POKEB() method writes a blob to Position.The .POKEB() method does not change the size of the blob. Use the <BLOB>.RESIZE() method to change the size of a blob.
